summary: Russia's invasion of Ukraine is causing devastating loss of life and threatening democracy in Europe. In response, the U.S. Agency for International Development has provided $22.9 billion to the Government of Ukraine through World Bank trust funds so it can continue critical operations and services. title: Ukraine: Oversight of U.S. Direct Budget Support
